<center>### Disease Ecology and Viruses at Vandenberg Air Force Base

<center>![](images/vafb_de_talk.jpeg){width=500px}

In a partnership with [STARBASE](https://dodstarbase.org/) , I gave a talk to a small group of middle-school students living on Vandenberg Air Force Base. We followed proper COVID-19 protocol for this talk, which included checking temperatures, socially distancing, wearing masks, and classroom ventilation.

Read more at:
https://www.vandenberg.spaceforce.mil/News/Article-Display/Article/2477738/starbase-stemazing-and-hands-on/
